title: ODI Cricket Analytics (Excel + Python)
summary: Explored ODI cricket data (2002–2023): player performance, strike rates, economy, and match-level insights via pivot tables and charts.

title: Australian Income Insights (Census Data)
summary: Cleaned, binned, and visualized income distributions; built slides and automated charts for an academic presentation.

title: REST APIs with FastAPI
summary: Designed and documented REST APIs with FastAPI; containerized services and wrote tests for key endpoints.
